messages.1000094967: Spirit's hand is summoned to stab enemies in front. Pressing the #y[Normal Attack Button] #w will allow a maximum of 4 consecutive attacks. \n#yDark Attribute\nATK for maximum hits {0}%+{1}
messages.1000094968:
While using #y[Turning Step]#w, press #y[Normal Attack Button]#w to throw Darkness Thorns in front. The thorns 
 will have small spikes formed on them that give additional damages before disappearing. 
#yDark Attribute
ATK {0}%
While the skill is being used, [Dummy Ghost] can be used.
messages.1000094994:
Spirit's hands are swished to make 3 consecutive attacks. Additional stun may occur for the last attack. 
#yDark Attribute
ATK: {0}%
Additional stun rate: {1}%
messages.1000094970:
Use the skill directly or press #y[Normal Attack Button]#w after using #y[Normal Attack In the Air]#w to attack the ground area with spirits' hands 4 times. 
#yDark Attribute
ATK per shot {0}%
Range {1}m
messages.1000094971: Use directly or press #y[Special Attack Button]#w during landing in #y[Phantom Claw] [Rampage Claw]#w and #y[Phantom's Rage] [Blitz Claw]#w to summon the spirit's hand to hit the enemies up in the air. \n#yDark Attribute\nATK {0}%
messages.1000094972:
Use directly or enter #y[Jump]#w key during #y[Turning Step]#w to summon the spirit's hand from the ground to attack enemies in front while you jump backwards and evade. Afterwards, #y[Ghost Kick] [Phantom's Rage]#w can be used in the air. 
#yDark Attribute
ATK {0}%
Only {3}% damage will be applied for more than {2} hits for each enemy
Invincible while jumping
messages.1000094973:
Creates an area of spirits around oneself for a certain period of time. 
Spirit's hands will appear every 2 seconds to attack enemies nearby.  
#yDark Attribute
ATK per attack {0}%
Duration {1} sec
messages.1000094974: Summons an area of spirits 4m in front from which the spirits' hands will appear in all directions to pull the enemies to the area and give damages when the area explodes. \n#yDark Attribute\nATK {0}%
messages.1000094975:
The user will have own HP reduced to increase attack power until the skill is used again to cancel. 
 When HP falls below 1, the effect disappears automatically. 
#yATK increased by {0}%
HP reduced by {2}% every 2 sec
messages.1000094976:
After going through the ritual of becoming possessed by the spirit, becomes invincible for a certain period of time and movement speed is increased. 
Enemies that approach during the ritual will be dealt serious damages. 
#yDark Attribute
ATK {0}%
Movement speed increased by {1}%
Cooldown rate increased by {2}%
Duration {3} sec
Damage received while performing skill reduced by {4}%
messages.1000094995:
Throws a Curse Talisman to make the target shot into #y[Branded]#w state. 
Afterwards, attacks by certain skills will automatically be fired to the location of #y[Branded]#w targets. 
#yDark Attribute
ATK {0}%
Duration {1} sec 
{2}% damage for additional talisman when [Normal Attack Button] is entered after the attack
Range {3}m

messages.1000094978:
Use directly or press #y[Special Attack Button]#w during #y[Turning Step]#w to throw talismans to 8 directions to attack enemies and make them into #y[Delayed]#w state.
 If there are targets that are #y[Branded]#w, corresponding number of talisman will be additionally thrown. 
#yDark Attribute
ATK {0}%
Movement speed is reduced by {1}% due to Delayed Effect and recovered in {2} sec
Range {3}m
[Dummy Ghost] can be used while the skill is being used
messages.1000096241: Summons an eery doll. Nothing happens when there are no enemies around but increases all damage on nearby enemies when there are enemies around. During the attack, the doll's durability is weakened and it will disintegrate when its durability falls to zero. \n#yDamage on enemies increased by {0}%\nEvery {1} sec, damage is increased and durability is reduced by {2}%
messages.1000096362:
{0} bird talismans are flown in front to attack enemies and turn them into #y[Cursed]#w state. 
If there are #y[Branded]#w targets, a corresponding number of additional birds will appear. 
#yDark Attribute
ATK per shot {1}%
Range {2}m

[Curse] details
(Max {3})
Cursed targets will get damage when they try to attack (for {4} sec)
{5}% of Magical ATK damage when the target tries to attack
Curse damage occurs once every {6} sec at least
All attribute resistance reduced by {7}% in cursed state
messages.1000094980:
Orders 3 paper snakes to attack enemies. 
If enemies are hit, they will be constantly given damage for a certain period of time and turn into #y[delayed]#w state. 
#yDark Attribute
ATK per shot {0}%
Movement speed is reduced by {1}% due to delay effect but is recovered up to {2}%
Duration {3} sec
Range {4}m
messages.1000096363:
Creates a gateway to connect to the realm of spirits. The gateway is sustained for {0} sec and #y[Curse]#w effect is inflicted on enemies by ghosts that pop out from the gate to attack enemies. If there are targets that are #y[Branded]#w, a corresponding number of ghosts will additionally appear. 
#yDark Attribute
{1}% of character's HP

Range {3}m

(Max {4})
Cursed targets will get damage when they try to attack (for {5} sec)
{6}% of Magical ATK damage when the target tries to attack
Curse damage occurs once every {7} sec at least

messages.1000096364:
Summons wolf spirit. The wolf spirit jumps to the front to attack enemies and howls to give damage with the spirit energy wave to nearby enemies. 
Attacked enemies will turn into #y[Cursed]#w state. 
#yDark Attribute
ATK {0}%

[Curse] Info
(Max {1})
Cursed targets will get damage when they try to attack (for {2} sec)
{3}% of ATK damage when the target tries to attack
Curse damage occurs once every {4} sec at least
All attribute resistance reduced by {5}% in cursed state
messages.1000096366:
Summons cursed dolls. The dolls deal damage on enemies above them and increases the character's attack power. 
#yDark Attribute
ATK {0}%
Own ATK increases by {1}%
messages.1000094984:
Creates an area in front which absorbs the surrounding souls and makes nearby targets into #y[Delay]#w state. 
When the ball that absorbs souls is completed, Bone Dragon appears from the Dark area to give serious damages to targets nearby. 
#yDark Attribute
ATK {0}%\nDue to delay effect, action speed is reduced by {1}% and is recovered to normal speed in {2} sec
[Cursed] targets will get {3}% additional damage.
messages.1000094969:
Spirit's hands are swished to make 3 consecutive attacks. Additional stun may occur for the last attack. Additional damage will be given to targets that are immune to stun.
#yDark Attribute
ATK: {0}%
Additional stun rate: {1}%
ATK's {2}% additional damage per hit for targets immune to stun
messages.1000094977:
Throws a Curse Talisman to make the target shot into #y[Branded]#w state. 
Afterwards, attacks by certain skills will automatically be fired to the location of #y[Branded]#w targets. 
When you are paralyzed or knocked back by a #y[Branded]#w enemy's attack, or when the skill is used again, the effect on #y[Branded]#w target will disappear (not applicable on attacks by summoned characters).
#yDark Attribute
ATK {0}%
Duration {1} sec
Range {2}m
